title: Manufacturing Engine-to-Dispatcher Wiring Completeness
scope: Cross-reference all manufacturing engines audited in QA-MS10 against dispatcher exposure

partially_wired: HarmonicAnalysisEngine -> no direct dispatcher action (used internally by chatter predict)
SpindleProtectionEngine -> prism_calc (via spindle protection actions) but catalog methods dead
not_wired: Grinding: no engine exists — inline in dispatcher
WhiteLayerDetectionEngine -> exists, supports grinding, NOT called by grindingDispatcher

findings.finding: 88% of manufacturing engines are fully wired to dispatchers
All 5-axis engines correctly wired 1:1 to prism_5axis actions
All 4 EDM engines correctly wired 1:1 to prism_edm actions
HarmonicAnalysisEngine and ThinFloorVibrationEngine have no direct dispatcher exposure
WhiteLayerDetectionEngine supports grinding but is not wired to grindingDispatcher
PostProcessorEngine wired to both prism_cam and prism_export — dual exposure is correct
